Adaptability.name: Adaptability
Adaptability.summary: Powers up moves of the same type.

Aerilate.name: Aerilate
Aerilate.summary: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves.

Aftermath.name: Aftermath
Aftermath.summary: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

Analytic.name: Analytic
Analytic.summary: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

Anger Point.name: Anger Point
Anger Point.summary: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

Aroma Veil.name: Aroma Veil
Aroma Veil.summary: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

Aura Break.name: Aura Break
Aura Break.summary: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.summary: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.

Battle Armor.name: Battle Armor
Battle Armor.summary: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Battle Bond.name: Battle Bond
Battle Bond.summary: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.

Beast Boost.name: Beast Boost
Beast Boost.summary: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.summary: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

Big Pecks.name: Big Pecks
Big Pecks.summary: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

Blaze.name: Blaze
Blaze.summary: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

Bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
Bulletproof.summary: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

Cheek Pouch.name: Cheek Pouch
Cheek Pouch.summary: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

Chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
Chlorophyll.summary: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

Clear Body.name: Clear Body
Clear Body.summary: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Color Change.name: Color Change
Color Change.summary: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

Comatose.name: Comatose
Comatose.summary: Prevents all status conditions except Sleep.

Competitive.name: Competitive
Competitive.summary: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

Contrary.name: Contrary
Contrary.summary: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Corrosion.name: Corrosion
Corrosion.summary: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.

Cursed Body.name: Cursed Body
Cursed Body.summary: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

Cute Charm.name: Cute Charm
Cute Charm.summary: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

Damp.name: Damp
Damp.summary: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

Dark Aura.name: Dark Aura
Dark Aura.summary: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

Dazzling.name: Dazzling
Dazzling.summary: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.

Defeatist.name: Defeatist
Defeatist.summary: Lowers stats when HP drops below half.

Defiant.name: Defiant
Defiant.summary: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

Delta Stream.name: Delta Stream
Delta Stream.summary: Creates strong winds when the ability activates.

Desolate Land.name: Desolate Land
Desolate Land.summary: Turns the sunlight extremely harsh when the ability activates.

Download.name: Download
Download.summary: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

Drizzle.name: Drizzle
Drizzle.summary: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

Drought.name: Drought
Drought.summary: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Dry Skin.name: Dry Skin
Dry Skin.summary: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

Early Bird.name: Early Bird
Early Bird.summary: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

Effect Spore.name: Effect Spore
Effect Spore.summary: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

Electric Surge.name: Electric Surge
Electric Surge.summary: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.

Emergency Exit.name: Emergency Exit
Emergency Exit.summary: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

Fairy Aura.name: Fairy Aura
Fairy Aura.summary: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

Flame Body.name: Flame Body
Flame Body.summary: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

Flare Boost.name: Flare Boost
Flare Boost.summary: Powers up special attacks when burned.

Flash Fire.name: Flash Fire
Flash Fire.summary: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

Flower Gift.name: Flower Gift
Flower Gift.summary: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

Flower Veil.name: Flower Veil
Flower Veil.summary: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

Fluffy.name: Fluffy
Fluffy.summary: Reduces damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

Forewarn.name: Forewarn
Forewarn.summary: Determines what moves a foe has.

Frisk.name: Frisk
Frisk.summary: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

Full Metal Body.name: Full Metal Body
Full Metal Body.summary: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Galvanize.name: Galvanize
Galvanize.summary: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is booste

Gluttony.name: Gluttony
Gluttony.summary: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

Gooey.name: Gooey
Gooey.summary: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Grass Pelt.name: Grass Pelt
Grass Pelt.summary: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

Grassy Surge.name: Grassy Surge
Grassy Surge.summary: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

Guts.name: Guts
Guts.summary: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

Harvest.name: Harvest
Harvest.summary: May create another Berry after one is used.

Healer.name: Healer
Healer.summary: May heal an ally's status conditions.

Heatproof.name: Heatproof
Heatproof.summary: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Honey Gather.name: Honey Gather
Honey Gather.summary: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.summary: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.summary: Heals status problems if it is raining.

Hyper Cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
Hyper Cutter.summary: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

Ice Body.name: Ice Body
Ice Body.summary: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

Illuminate.name: Illuminate
Illuminate.summary: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

Illusion.name: Illusion
Illusion.summary: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

Immunity.name: Immunity
Immunity.summary: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

Imposter.name: Imposter
Imposter.summary: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

Infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.summary: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

Inner Focus.name: Inner Focus
Inner Focus.summary: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

Insomnia.name: Insomnia
Insomnia.summary: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Iron Barbs.name: Iron Barbs
Iron Barbs.summary: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

Iron Fist.name: Iron Fist
Iron Fist.summary: Boosts the power of punching moves.

Justified.name: Justified
Justified.summary: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

Keen Eye.name: Keen Eye
Keen Eye.summary: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

Klutz.name: Klutz
Klutz.summary: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

Leaf Guard.name: Leaf Guard
Leaf Guard.summary: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.summary: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

Lightning Rod.name: Lightning Rod
Lightning Rod.summary: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Limber.name: Limber
Limber.summary: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

Liquid Ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
Liquid Ooze.summary: Damages attackers using any draining move.

Liquid Voice.name: Liquid Voice
Liquid Voice.summary: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

Long Reach.name: Long Reach
Long Reach.summary: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

Magic Guard.name: Magic Guard
Magic Guard.summary: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Magician.name: Magician
Magician.summary: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

Magma Armor.name: Magma Armor
Magma Armor.summary: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

Marvel Scale.name: Marvel Scale
Marvel Scale.summary: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

Mega Launcher.name: Mega Launcher
Mega Launcher.summary: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.

Merciless.name: Merciless
Merciless.summary: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

Minus.name: Minus
Minus.summary: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Misty Surge.name: Misty Surge
Misty Surge.summary: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.

Mold Breaker.name: Mold Breaker
Mold Breaker.summary: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Moody.name: Moody
Moody.summary: Raises one stat and lowers another.

Motor Drive.name: Motor Drive
Motor Drive.summary: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

Moxie.name: Moxie
Moxie.summary: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

Multiscale.name: Multiscale
Multiscale.summary: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Multitype.name: Multitype
Multitype.summary: Changes type to match the held Plate.

Mummy.name: Mummy
Mummy.summary: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

Natural Cure.name: Natural Cure
Natural Cure.summary: All status problems heal when it switches out.

No Guard.name: No Guard
No Guard.summary: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

Normalize.name: Normalize
Normalize.summary: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

Overcoat.name: Overcoat
Overcoat.summary: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

Overgrow.name: Overgrow
Overgrow.summary: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

Own Tempo.name: Own Tempo
Own Tempo.summary: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

Parental Bond.name: Parental Bond
Parental Bond.summary: Allows the Pokémon to attack twice.

Pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
Pickpocket.summary: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

Pickup.name: Pickup
Pickup.summary: The Pokémon may pick up items.

Pixilate.name: Pixilate
Pixilate.summary: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

Plus.name: Plus
Plus.summary: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Poison Heal.name: Poison Heal
Poison Heal.summary: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

Poison Point.name: Poison Point
Poison Point.summary: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

Poison Touch.name: Poison Touch
Poison Touch.summary: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

Power Construct.name: Power Construct
Power Construct.summary: Changes form when HP drops below half.

Power of Alchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
Power of Alchemy.summary: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

Prankster.name: Prankster
Prankster.summary: Gives priority to a status move.

Pressure.name: Pressure
Pressure.summary: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

Primordial Sea.name: Primordial Sea
Primordial Sea.summary: Makes it rain heavily when the ability activates.

Prism Armor.name: Prism Armor
Prism Armor.summary: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

Protean.name: Protean
Protean.summary: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

Psychic Surge.name: Psychic Surge
Psychic Surge.summary: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.

Quick Feet.name: Quick Feet
Quick Feet.summary: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

Rain Dish.name: Rain Dish
Rain Dish.summary: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

Rattled.name: Rattled
Rattled.summary: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

Receiver.name: Receiver
Receiver.summary: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.summary: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

Refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
Refrigerate.summary: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.

Regenerator.name: Regenerator
Regenerator.summary: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

Rivalry.name: Rivalry
Rivalry.summary: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

RKS System.name: RKS System
RKS System.summary: Changes type depending on held item.

Rock Head.name: Rock Head
Rock Head.summary: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Rough Skin.name: Rough Skin
Rough Skin.summary: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

Run Away.name: Run Away
Run Away.summary: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

Sand Force.name: Sand Force
Sand Force.summary: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

Sand Rush.name: Sand Rush
Sand Rush.summary: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

Sand Stream.name: Sand Stream
Sand Stream.summary: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

Sand Veil.name: Sand Veil
Sand Veil.summary: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

Sap Sipper.name: Sap Sipper
Sap Sipper.summary: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

Scrappy.name: Scrappy
Scrappy.summary: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

Serene Grace.name: Serene Grace
Serene Grace.summary: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

Shadow Shield.name: Shadow Shield
Shadow Shield.summary: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Shed Skin.name: Shed Skin
Shed Skin.summary: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

Sheer Force.name: Sheer Force
Sheer Force.summary: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

Shell Armor.name: Shell Armor
Shell Armor.summary: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Shield Dust.name: Shield Dust
Shield Dust.summary: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Shields Down.name: Shields Down
Shields Down.summary: Changes stats when HP drops below half.

Skill Link.name: Skill Link
Skill Link.summary: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Slush Rush.name: Slush Rush
Slush Rush.summary: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Sniper.name: Sniper
Sniper.summary: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

Snow Warning.name: Snow Warning
Snow Warning.summary: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

Solar Power.name: Solar Power
Solar Power.summary: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

Soul-Heart.name: Soul-Heart
Soul-Heart.summary: Raises Special Attack when an ally faints.

Speed Boost.name: Speed Boost
Speed Boost.summary: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Stakeout.name: Stakeout
Stakeout.summary: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.

Stall.name: Stall
Stall.summary: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

Stance Change.name: Stance Change
Stance Change.summary: Changes form depending on moves used.

Static.name: Static
Static.summary: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.summary: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.summary: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

Sticky Hold.name: Sticky Hold
Sticky Hold.summary: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

Storm Drain.name: Storm Drain
Storm Drain.summary: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Strong Jaw.name: Strong Jaw
Strong Jaw.summary: Boosts the power of biting moves.

Sturdy.name: Sturdy
Sturdy.summary: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

Suction Cups.name: Suction Cups
Suction Cups.summary: Negates all moves that force switching out.

Super Luck.name: Super Luck
Super Luck.summary: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.summary: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

Sweet Veil.name: Sweet Veil
Sweet Veil.summary: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

Swift Swim.name: Swift Swim
Swift Swim.summary: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

Symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis.summary: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

Synchronize.name: Synchronize
Synchronize.summary: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

Tangled Feet.name: Tangled Feet
Tangled Feet.summary: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

Tangling Hair.name: Tangling Hair
Tangling Hair.summary: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

Technician.name: Technician
Technician.summary: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

Telepathy.name: Telepathy
Telepathy.summary: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

Teravolt.name: Teravolt
Teravolt.summary: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Thick Fat.name: Thick Fat
Thick Fat.summary: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Torrent.name: Torrent
Torrent.summary: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

Tough Claws.name: Tough Claws
Tough Claws.summary: Boosts the power of contact moves.

Toxic Boost.name: Toxic Boost
Toxic Boost.summary: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

Trace.name: Trace
Trace.summary: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

Truant.name: Truant
Truant.summary: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

Turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
Turboblaze.summary: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Unaware.name: Unaware
Unaware.summary: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

Unburden.name: Unburden
Unburden.summary: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

Unnerve.name: Unnerve
Unnerve.summary: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

Victory Star.name: Victory Star
Victory Star.summary: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

Vital Spirit.name: Vital Spirit
Vital Spirit.summary: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Volt Absorb.name: Volt Absorb
Volt Absorb.summary: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

Water Absorb.name: Water Absorb
Water Absorb.summary: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

Water Bubble.name: Water Bubble
Water Bubble.summary: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon

Water Compaction.name: Water Compaction
Water Compaction.summary: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

Water Veil.name: Water Veil
Water Veil.summary: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Weak Armor.name: Weak Armor
Weak Armor.summary: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

White Smoke.name: White Smoke
White Smoke.summary: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Wimp Out.name: Wimp Out
Wimp Out.summary: Switches out when HP drops below half.

Wonder Skin.name: Wonder Skin
Wonder Skin.summary: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

Zen Mode.name: Zen Mode
Zen Mode.summary: Changes form when HP drops below half.
